titleStmt.title: Hermann Bahr – Textverzeichnis
A Letter from Germany. Munich, April, 1930

publicationStmt.publisher: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage (ACDH-CH)

sourceDesc.p: Bibliografische Angaben eines in Druck erschienen Texts von Bahr

analytic.author: Bahr, Hermann
analytic.title: A Letter from Germany. Munich, April, 1930

biblStruct.note: The editor reminds me that it is a long time since I sent my usual account of German literature.
Hermann Bahr: A Letter from Germany. Munich, April, 1930. In: The London Mercury, Jg. 22, Nr. 129, July 1930, S. 258–259.
